name: Bots & rails
description:
In this game, you have to shoot down flying robots to keep your train safe through 10 waves of enemies and deliver your cargo. Killing enemies gives you scrap, you can use it to buy new turrets and to upgrade them. You can also use scrap to upgrade your character's weapon.

Move with WASD

Hold left mouse button to shoot enemies

Press R to buy and place rocket turrets

Press T to buy and place normal turrets

Press ESC to pause and open the upgrades menu

You can also repair your turrets by pressing the right mouse button on them.

Good luck!
